section.title: Introduction
section.p: We use coding standards to be able to write code easy to understand, to maintain, and to enhance.
We are using the commit and then review approach. Still nothing that not have been tested should be committed. First test then commit!!!

section.title: Java Code
section.p: Generally we stick with standards. In the case of coding standards we simply use the guidelines from Sun.

ul.li: Thou shalt only produce code conforming to the Java code conventions, as they are set down on the page http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/html/CodeConvTOC.doc.html
Thou shalt not produce any code containing tab-stops.

section.title: XML and XSP
section.p: The only restriction we impose on XML, XSLT and XSP code is that the indenting is 2 spaces. Again please no tab stops.
